definition: surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]
(old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy
a type of standing harp, smaller than konghou 箜篌, with 5-25 strings
Rutherford (name)/Ernest Rutherford (1871-1937), early nuclear physicist from New Zealand

sentences.chinese: 卢瑟福用的是阿尔法粒子。

sentences.english: He spends most of his time at the nets'practice center in east rutherford n. j.
sentences.chinese: 他多数时间都在篮网建于东卢瑟福的训练中心度过。

sentences.english: He'd come back, and Rutherford accepted him in his lab.
sentences.chinese: 他就来了，卢瑟福接收他到他的实验室来。

sentences.english: J. J. Thompson, model. Rutherford, experimental data.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆逊，模型，卢瑟福，数据。

sentences.english: He far preferred Rutherford to Thompson.
sentences.chinese: 相比汤姆逊他更喜欢卢瑟福。

sentences.english: So, that's Rutherford's explanation of this set of data.
sentences.chinese: 这就是卢瑟福怎么解释这些数据的。

sentences.english: One of the proponents is Ernest Rutherford.
sentences.chinese: 一个支持者是恩内斯特，卢瑟福。

sentences.english: But, before I go into details, a little bit more background about Rutherford.
sentences.chinese: 在进入细节之前，先了解一些卢瑟福的背景知识。
这就是著名的卢瑟福实验。

sentences.english: There's Rutherford, there's Geiger, there's Marsden.
The American competitors were running close behind Rutherford and were beaten only by a few weeks.
sentences.chinese: 美国的竞争者紧随卢瑟福之后，只晚了几个星期。

sentences.english: One theorist played an essential role in Rutherford's thinking.
sentences.chinese: 在卢瑟福的思考中一位理论家起到了关键作用。
卢瑟福尝试了不同的金属。

sentences.english: And, that's what Rutherford says, this can't be right.
sentences.chinese: 这就是卢瑟福所的，这不可能是对的。

definition: Qingyang county in Chizhou 池州[Chi2 zhou1], Anhui
Lianyun district of Lianyungang city 連雲港市|连云港市[Lian2 yun2 gang3 shi4], Jiangsu
Lin Xu (1875-1898), one of the Six Gentlemen Martyrs 戊戌六君子[Wu4 xu1 Liu4 jun1 zi5] of the unsuccessful reform movement of 1898
time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world
Xuan Yuan, personal name of Huangdi, the Yellow Emperor 黃帝|黄帝[Huang2 di4]
